content: Do ordinary members of Lean Zulip not have permission to create their own (private) stream? I'm trying to collaborate with multiple people, and so want to create a stream.
I think it got disabled because people were accidentally creating streams instead of new topics. You can have private group messages.
@Vasily Ilin If private group messages is too disorganized, please ping the @maintainers and we can make a stream for you.
I think we should create this stream right away. We know from the perfectoid project that having all discussions in private messages isn't convenient, even with a small team.
@maintainers , can I please get my own stream? We'll be working with a team of 7 students, learning Lean, hopefully working up to formalizing something new. Thank you!
Name: University of Washington. @Patrick Massot
FWIW there's an Imperial College private stream but nowadays we just use a discord server.
